attributes.action: Block EU from lifting diamond trade ban on Zimbabwe
attributes.additional_details:
The EU is undermining the Kimberley Process by seeking to partially lift the international trade ban enforced on Zimbabwe in 2009.

EU Officials want to allow the import of diamonds from the Marange region of Zimbabwe while there are still torture camps in the area, forcing civilians to mine diamonds.

Sign this petition to continue the fight against Blood Diamonds and forced labour.
